Containers.Name: H265ize
Containers.Overview: Red is a fully modular bot – meaning all features and commands can be enabled/disabled to your liking, making it completely customizable. This is a self-hosted bot – meaning you will need to host and maintain your own instance. You can turn Red into an admin bot, music bot, trivia bot, new best friend or all of these together!
Containers.Description: Red is a fully modular bot – meaning all features and commands can be enabled/disabled to your liking, making it completely customizable. This is a self-hosted bot – meaning you will need to host and maintain your own instance. You can turn Red into an admin bot, music bot, trivia bot, new best friend or all of these together!

Config.Name: mnt Directory
Config.Description: This is the mnt directory of your unraid server<br>Container path: /mnt

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: The destination folder where you want your re-encoded video to be (recomended to be the parent directory of your input if you are planning to replace your source)

Config.Name: Input Directory
Config.Description: The source folder that contain video files you want to re-encode

Config.Name: Quantization Parameter
Config.Description: Quantization Parameter, read the h265 docs for more info

Config.Name: Quality Preset
Config.Description: ultrafast, superfast, veryfast, faster, fast, medium, slow, slower, veryslow, placebo | https://x265.readthedocs.io/en/default/presets.html for more info

Containers.DonateText: If you like it, then consider buying me a soda as I don't like beer :P
